result.description:
Unable to connect to database "marina" via JDBC. The database or host may be down. Connection error: Cannot connect to database due to: Exception occurred while getting connection: oracle.ucp.UniversalConnectionPoolException: Cannot get Connection from Datasource: java.sql.SQLException: Listener refused the connection with the following error:
ORA-12505, TNS:listener does not currently know of SID given in connect descriptor
 .
result.title: Unable to connect to remote database during dSource policy enforcement
result.action: Make sure that the affected database is running and connectivity is available.

result.action: Use the CLI TimeFlow Log Fetch command to retrieve the missing log. The log can only be retrieved from a non-ASM location.
result.title: Cannot provision a database from a portion of TimeFlow
result.description: Database "carmel" TimeFlow "default" is missing log sequence 1.1072 because LogSync failed to fetch it more than 3 times.

result.title: Unable to connect to remote database during virtual database policy enforcement

result.response: Virtual database snapshot policy is disabled.

result.description: Either the Hook operations could not be run due to issues with the target environment or an operation exited with a non-zero exit status.
result.action: Inspect the Delphix Engine's event viewer for more information about the failure.
result.title: Hook operations failed to complete successfully
